dataValueTemplate.annotation:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM patient_state ps INNER JOIN patient_program pg ON pg.patient_program_id=ps.patient_program_id INNER JOIN person p ON pg.patient_id = p.person_id INNER JOIN program_workflow_state pws ON pws.program_workflow_state_id=ps.state
WHERE (pws.concept_id = 100126145 OR pws.concept_id = 100126146) AND start_date BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND birthdate IS NOT NULL AND (DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),birthdate) / 365) > 1

SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM patient_state ps INNER JOIN patient_program pg ON pg.patient_program_id=ps.patient_program_id INNER JOIN person p ON pg.patient_id = p.person_id INNER JOIN program_workflow_state pws ON pws.program_workflow_state_id=ps.state
WHERE (pws.concept_id = 100126145 OR pws.concept_id = 100126146) AND start_date BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND birthdate IS NOT NULL AND (DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),birthdate) / 365) <= 1

FROM patient_state ps INNER JOIN patient_program pg ON pg.patient_program_id=ps.patient_program_id INNER JOIN person p ON pg.patient_id = p.person_id INNER JOIN program_workflow_state pws ON pws.program_workflow_state_id=ps.state
WHERE pws.concept_id = 100126153 AND start_date BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND birthdate IS NOT NULL AND (DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),birthdate) / 365) <= 1

FROM patient_state ps INNER JOIN patient_program pg ON pg.patient_program_id=ps.patient_program_id INNER JOIN person p ON pg.patient_id = p.person_id INNER JOIN program_workflow_state pws ON pws.program_workflow_state_id=ps.state

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM obs o INNER JOIN encounter e ON e.encounter_id = o.encounter_id AND e.encounter_type= 20
WHERE concept_id = 325 AND DATE(obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod;

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(current_quantity),0) FROM ( SELECT current_quantity FROM drug dr INNER JOIN inventory_store_drug isd ON isd.drug_id = dr.drug_id WHERE concept_id= 193 AND created_on <= '2016-06-01' ORDER BY created_on DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS qnty;
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(receipt_quantity),0) FROM drug dr INNER JOIN inventory_store_drug isd ON isd.drug_id = dr.drug_id WHERE concept_id=193 AND (created_on BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod);

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(closing_balance),0) FROM ( SELECT closing_balance FROM drug dr INNER JOIN inventory_store_drug isd ON isd.drug_id = dr.drug_id WHERE concept_id= 193 AND created_on <= '2016-06-30' ORDER BY created_on DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS qnty;

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(current_quantity),0) FROM drug dr INNER JOIN inventory_store_drug isd ON isd.drug_id = dr.drug_id WHERE (concept_id= 100126153 OR concept_id= 100126150 OR concept_id= 100126151 OR concept_id= 100126152) AND created_on <= '2016-06-01';

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(receipt_quantity),0) FROM drug dr INNER JOIN inventory_store_drug isd ON isd.drug_id = dr.drug_id WHERE (concept_id= 100126153 OR concept_id= 100126150 OR concept_id= 100126151 OR concept_id= 100126152) AND (created_on BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod);

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(closing_balance),0) FROM drug dr INNER JOIN inventory_store_drug isd ON isd.drug_id = dr.drug_id WHERE (concept_id= 100126153 OR concept_id= 100126150 OR concept_id= 100126151 OR concept_id= 100126152) AND created_on <= '2016-06-30';

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.person_id) AS 'Count' FROM person p INNER JOIN obs o ON o.person_id = p.person_id WHERE p.voided = 0 AND o.voided = 0 AND o.concept_id=5109 AND DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND o.value_coded IN (1104,117152) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) >5

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.person_id) AS 'Count' FROM person p INNER JOIN obs o ON o.person_id = p.person_id WHERE p.voided = 0 AND o.voided = 0 AND o.concept_id=5109 AND DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND o.value_coded IN (4038,1083) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) >5

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.person_id) AS 'Count' FROM person p INNER JOIN obs o ON o.person_id = p.person_id WHERE p.voided = 0 AND o.voided = 0 AND o.concept_id=5109 AND DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND o.value_coded IN (1022,1846,4333,160180,160205) AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),p.birthdate)))) >5

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(current_quantity),0) FROM( SELECT current_quantity FROM drug dr INNER JOIN inventory_store_drug isd ON isd.drug_id = dr.drug_id WHERE concept_id= 5498 AND created_on <= '2016-06-01' ORDER BY created_on DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS qnty;
#INCLUDE

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(closing_balance),0) FROM( SELECT closing_balance FROM drug dr INNER JOIN inventory_store_drug isd ON isd.drug_id = dr.drug_id WHERE concept_id= 1018 AND created_on <= '2016-06-30' ORDER BY created_on DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS qnty;
#INCLUDE
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(receipt_quantity),0) FROM drug dr INNER JOIN inventory_store_drug isd ON isd.drug_id = dr.drug_id WHERE concept_id=88 AND (created_on BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod);

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(closing_balance),0) FROM( SELECT closing_balance FROM drug dr INNER JOIN inventory_store_drug isd ON isd.drug_id = dr.drug_id WHERE concept_id= 88 AND created_on <= '2016-06-30' ORDER BY created_on DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS qnty;

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(current_quantity),0) FROM( SELECT current_quantity FROM drug dr INNER JOIN inventory_store_drug isd ON isd.drug_id = dr.drug_id WHERE concept_id= 100126164 AND created_on <= '2016-06-01' ORDER BY created_on DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS qnty;

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(closing_balance),0) FROM( SELECT closing_balance FROM drug dr INNER JOIN inventory_store_drug isd ON isd.drug_id = dr.drug_id WHERE concept_id=100126165 AND created_on <= '2016-06-30' ORDER BY created_on DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS qnty;
